sense.gloss: unglazed pottery, bisque, bisque firing, biscuit ware
roasting or grilling without seasoning (seafood, nuts, etc.)
simple okonomiyaki without any extra ingredients

sdata.j: ちょっと↑手↑↓て↓を↑休↑↓やす↓めて↑気持↑↓きも↓ちを↑和↑↓やわ↓らげれば、↑肩↑↓かた↓のストレ|スや↑緊張↑↓き|んちょう↓↑感↑↓かん↓がとれるよ。
sdata.e: If you stop and relax, this will relieve the tension and stress in your shoulders.

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓で、↑鹿↑↓しか↓やムー|スやキ|ジといった↑野性↑↓やせい↓↑獣↑↓じゅう↓を↑狩↑↓か↓ることは↑違法↑↓いほう↓とする↑国↑↓くに↓が↑多↑↓おお↓い。
sdata.e: In many parts of the world it is illegal to shoot wild game such as deer, moose or pheasant.
